#summary Example of using the peaberry bundle with Newton/Infiniflow.

=Newton/Infiniflow Example=

This short example shows how you can easily switch between local and distributed OSGi services by using peaberry with the [http://newton.codecauldron.org Newton/Infiniflow] distributed OSGi framework.

 # Download [http://newton.codecauldron.org/site/download/release-1.3.2.html Newton 1.3.2]
 # Download [http://peaberry.googlecode.com/files/peaberry-1.1.1-newton-example.zip the example]
 # {{{unzip newton_bin-1.3.2.zip}}}
 # {{{cd newton-1.3.2}}}
 # {{{unzip peaberry-1.1.1-newton-example.zip}}}
 # now read *examples/peaberry/README.txt*

This example is based on the original [http://newton.codecauldron.org/site/example/Spring-OSGi-Chainlink.html Spring-OSGi-Chainlink] example. A short condensed list of instructions specific to peaberry can be found in examples/peaberry/README.txt, for more context please consult the original Spring-OSGi-Chainlink instructions.
